abstract: Warren E. Buffett and Bill Gates are set to meet China’s super rich Wednesday to sell the art of giving over a dinner that has sparked some soul searching — and debate — among the world’s second-largest number of billionaires.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett and Bill Gates are set to meet China’s super rich Wednesday to sell the art of giving over a dinner that has sparked some soul searching — and debate — among the world’s second-largest number of billionaires.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett and Bill Gates are set to meet China’s super rich Wednesday to sell the art of giving over a dinner that has sparked some soul searching — and debate — among the world’s second-largest number of billionaires, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Buffett and Gates Hobnobbing With China’s Rich
